statements: SELECT game_id, game_date, winning_team FROM baseball_games;
SELECT losing_team, losing_score FROM baseball_games WHERE winning_score > 5;
SELECT mvp_name, game_date, winning_team, winning_score FROM baseball_games ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM baseball_games WHERE mvp_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT game_id, winning_team, losing_team, key_plays FROM baseball_games WHERE key_plays LIKE '%homerun%';
SELECT game_id, game_date, winning_team, losing_team, winning_score, losing_score FROM baseball_games WHERE winning_score > losing_score ORDER BY game_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT winning_team, COUNT(*) as wins FROM baseball_games GROUP BY winning_team HAVING wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT game_date, winning_team, losing_team, mvp_name FROM baseball_games WHERE mvp_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY game_date LIMIT 3;
SELECT game_id, winning_team, losing_team, key_plays FROM baseball_games WHERE key_plays LIKE '%home run%' ORDER BY game_id;
SELECT DISTINCT winning_team, losing_team FROM baseball_games ORDER BY winning_team, losing_team LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM baseball_games
SELECT home_team, away_team, date FROM baseball_games WHERE home_score > 5
SELECT * FROM game_details
SELECT mvp, key_play FROM game_details WHERE game_id = 10
SELECT home_team, away_team, date, home_score, away_score FROM baseball_games ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM baseball_games WHERE home_score > 5 ORDER BY date DESC, game_id ASC
SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team FROM baseball_games WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY game_id DESC
SELECT home_team, SUM(home_score) AS total_home_score FROM baseball_games GROUP BY home_team HAVING COUNT(game_id) > 10 ORDER BY total_home_score DESC
SELECT g.game_id, g.date, g.home_team, g.away_team, gd.key_play, gd.mvp FROM baseball_games g INNER JOIN game_details gd ON g.game_id = gd.game_id WHERE gd.mvp = 'Player1' ORDER BY g.date ASC
SELECT * FROM baseball_games WHERE home_score = (SELECT MAX(home_score) FROM baseball_games) AND away_score = (SELECT MAX(away_score) FROM baseball_games)
SELECT * FROM scores;
SELECT team, score FROM scores WHERE score > 50;
SELECT player_name FROM mvps WHERE team = 'Blue Team';
SELECT game_id, team, score FROM scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT play_id, play_description FROM key_plays WHERE play_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM scores WHERE team='Team A' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, team FROM mvps WHERE game_id=101
SELECT game_id, team, score FROM scores WHERE score > 50
SELECT play_description FROM key_plays WHERE play_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM scores JOIN mvps ON scores.game_id = mvps.game_id
SELECT * FROM baseball_games WHERE home_team = 'New York Yankees';
SELECT game_date, home_team, away_team FROM baseball_games WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM baseball_games WHERE game_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE team = 'Boston Red Sox';
SELECT team_name, city, state FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM baseball_games WHERE home_score > away_score ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM baseball_games WHERE game_date = '2022-09-01';
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, t.team_name FROM players p JOIN teams t ON p.team = t.team_name WHERE p.position = 'Pitcher';
SELECT g.game_date, g.home_team, g.away_team, r.mvp FROM baseball_games g JOIN game_results r ON g.game_id = r.game_id WHERE r.mvp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT city, state FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Red Sox%';
SELECT * FROM games LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_location, winning_team, losing_team FROM games ORDER BY game_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Goalkeeper';
SELECT game_id, player_id, play_description FROM plays WHERE play_result = 'Scored' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_location = 'New York';
SELECT game_date, winning_team FROM games WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_position = 'QB';
SELECT game_id, play_description FROM plays WHERE play_result = 'Touchdown';
SELECT award_category, player_id FROM awards WHERE award_category = 'MVP';
